dict.acceptation: 装底；测量深浅；查明真相；

sent.orig: This club to collect, introduction and link up all of bottom guy.
sent.trans: 这是一个收集，介绍及联系各界bottom男同胞之联谊会。

sent.orig: Struction: made up of duct bottom and lid. with two outholes designed the bottom.
sent.trans: 构造：由槽底及槽盖两部分组成，底槽两侧没出线孔。

sent.orig: Top to Bottom Focus: Visualizing a run from top to bottom with air.
sent.trans: 从顶到底的注意力集中：将赛道从头到尾在心中形象化，包括空中。

sent.orig: The best we a reduction of another 3BOTTOM dollars. That'll definitely be rock-bottom.
sent.trans: 我们最多只能再减3BOTTOM美元。这可真是最低价了。

sent.orig: Instead of adding from top to bottom, timers will be shown from bottom to top.
sent.trans: 计时条的显示将从下到上增长而不是从上到下。
